DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess efficacy McKenzie method patient chronic non-specific low back .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Mckenzie Method Patients With Chronic Non-Specific Low Back Pain
DOC.detailed_description: One hundred forty-eight patient randomly allocate two treatment group : McKenzie method Placebo ( detuned ultrasound short wave therapy ) 5 week ( total 10 session 30 minute ) . The clinical outcome obtain completion treatment ( 5 week ) 3 , 6 , 12 month randomization . The data collect blinded assessor . The statistical analysis follow intention-to-treat principle between-group difference calculate construct mixed linear model .
DOC.criteria: patient seek care chronic nonspecific low back pain ( define pain discomfort costal margin inferior gluteal fold , without refer symptom low limb , least 3 month ) , pain intensity least 3 point measure 010 point pain numerical rating scale , age 18 80 year able read Portuguese . patient exclude contraindication physical exercise ultrasound short wave therapy , evidence nerve root compromise ( i.e one motor , reflex sensation deficit ) , serious spinal pathology ( fracture , tumor , inflammatory infectious disease ) , serious cardiovascular metabolic disease , previous back surgery pregnancy .
